text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC It wasn’t the governor that made that choice.. it was you, back in March when you ignored COVID19. If you’d done your job, maybe you’d be having the gatherings you crave so badly. More importantly, we wouldn’t have over 130,000 dead needlessly.
